0.2.2.name: wordpress/social-opt-in
0.2.2.description: Plugin to add social services to WordPress while protecting the privacy of the visitors. Visitors have to activate each social service. No data is sent to any servers if the visitor doesn't want to. This plugin is totally hosted on your server.
